column5: ATRS Why would they start doing that now its not their MO They just deliver 50 rev growth and profitability for 2019 and possibly 100 rev growth for 2020 You should sell and buy another stock if you expect them to change their MO Or buy and stash away
ATRS it would nice if management would dosay something to instill some buying confidence in the investment community Jeesh

ATRS On the positive side it appears daily lows are rising with continued low volume trading I look forward to the current consolidationbase building phase coming to an end with the rapidly improving fundamentals providing a resumption of an upward trend taking the share price to realistic much higher share prices over the short term and longer term well into the coming years
